title: Little League Championship - 5v5 League

embed.description: Hey Summoners!My friend and I would like to host a mini League of Legends tournament called Little League Champions. If...

body:
Hey Summoners!
I will be running a League starting on the 15th of January for pre-made teams and free agents from Iron to Gold. I'd like to stress that this will not be a one day event but will instead be an event going over a 6-10 weeks with the games being played every Tuesday at 7:00 PM AEDT. I look forward to your participation, if you have any questions or are looking for more information please do not be afraid to ask on our Discord server :) discord.gg/WryGZFg

From, Benji

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
